long_description: With a cinch-top closure, the light and collapsible Ruffwear Bivy Cinch pet bowl stores food while you're on the go, then opens easily to feed your furry friend anywhere your adventures take you. Welded nylon fabric creates a watertight seal. Bowl collapses down small to fit in a corner of your dog pack or day pack. Stable shape and wide, slip-resistant bottom allow easy eating; 60 fl. oz. capacity (1.8L). The Ruffwear Bivy Cinch pet bowl cleans up easily and features a hang loop for clipping to your pack or hanging out to dry.
short_description: With a cinch-top closure, the light and collapsible Ruffwear Bivy Cinch pet bowl stores food while you're on the go, then opens easily to feed your furry friend anywhere your adventures take you.
